t: Portland Pet Food Company Cat Food Review - Cats.com
s: April 4, 2025 - Despite having been in business for over a decade, Portland Pet Food Company still seems to be a boutique operation. The brand doesn’t have a presence on third-party review sites like TrustPilot and customer ratings from major online retailers like Amazon and Chewy are limited.
